titleStmt.title: The prisoners and Claracilla Two tragæ-comedies. As they were presented at the Phœnix in Drury-Lane, by her Mties. servants. Written by Tho. Killigrew, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Killigrew, Thomas, 1612-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "The prisoners" and "Claracilla" each has separately dated title page, the first dated 1640; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard
